code: import React from'react';import{connect}from'react-redux';var mapStateToProps=function mapStateToProps(state){return{posts:state.posts};};var ConnectedProblemList=function ConnectedProblemList(_ref){var posts=_ref.posts;console.log("connectedProblemList: posts: ",posts);return React.createElement("ul",null,posts.map(function(postData){postData.data.map(function(post){return React.createElement("li",{key:post.id},React.createElement("h4",null,post.title),React.createElement("p",null,post.description));});}));};var ProblemList=connect(mapStateToProps)(ConnectedProblemList);export default ProblemList;
